title: Chah Dashi Marn
content: On the way from Nehbandan to Chah Dashi in south Khorasan province, one can see such an eye- catching erosion phenomenon. The Neogene formations of mart, conglomerate, silt, and sandstone in various colors of red, brown, cream, and white have created a rare landscape. The structure of this colorful area is like the undeveloped badlands.
